# NSDragOperation

**Structure**

A group of constants that represent which operations the dragging source can perform on dragging items.

## Declaration

```swift
struct NSDragOperation
```

## Constants

- **copy**: A constant that indicates the drag can copy the data that the image represents.
- **link**: A constant that indicates the drag can share the data.
- **generic**: A constant that indicates the destination can define the drag operation.
- **private**: A constant that indicates the source and destination negotiate the drag operation privately.
- **move**: A constant that indicates the drag can move the data.
- **delete**: A constant that indicates the drag can delete the data.
- **every**: A constant that indicates that drag can perform all of the drag operations.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

## Deprecated

- **all**: Use [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDragOperation/every] instead.
- **all_Obsolete**: The `NSDragOperationAll` constant is deprecated. Use [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDragOperation/every] instead.

## Constants

- **NSDraggingItemEnumerationOptions**: A group of constants that specify options to use when enumerating dragging items.
- **NSSpringLoadingHighlight**: A group of constants that indicate a highlighting style for your app’s user interface to display during a spring-loading operation.
- **NSDraggingFormation**: Constants that control the visual format of multiple dragging items.
- **NSDraggingContext**: Constants that specify whether a drag terminates within or outside the application.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
